headline: Needham Reiterates its ‘Buy’ Rating on The Walt Disney Company (DIS) with a $125 Price Target
summary: The Walt Disney Company (NYSE:DIS) is one of the 13 Best Diversified Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. On September 23, 2025, Needham reiterated its ‘Buy’ rating on The Walt Disney Company (NYSE:DIS) with a $125 price target.
